items.title: Upcoming London show
items.description: Kajiki Volt will be playing The Water Rats, London on Saturday, 10 March 2018.

items.title: Return to The Dublin Castle
items.description: The Volt played a storming set at The Dublin Castle on Saturday 27th January, you can watch a snippet below. Follow us on Facebook for more..
